titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2643) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2643) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-211, by Mr. Hastings (FL).
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 80.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 514.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2643 (Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008).
